text: @RealCandaceO @GovSisolak I love how you turn words around to scare your followers. The drugs mentioned have not been fully tested for the Coronavirus to determine if the drug can assist in the fight or could create harmful side effects. Gov can’t just handle out drugs based on hearsay.
